title: “Jim Henson’s Labyrinth: In Concert” Tour Extended to 2025
description: The spring leg will stop in 35 new cities, including Los Angeles, Austin, Chicago, Nashville, and New York. “Jim Henson’s Labyrinth: In Concert” Tour Extended to 2025 Eddie Fu
author: Eddie Fu
excerpt: "Jim Henson’s Labyrinth: In Concert" North American tour has been extended through spring 2025, featuring live music accompanying the film.
text: “Jim Henson’s Labyrinth: In Concert” North American tour kicked off in September 2024, featuring a band performing the score to the David Bowie 1986 cult classic live to screen in sync with his original vocals. Thanks to popular demand, a second North American leg has been announced, extending it through spring 2025. Featuring more than 35 additional cities, the spring leg begins on March 16th in Santa Barbara, California, and will continue with stops in Los Angeles, Austin, Chicago, Nashville, New York, and more. See the full itinerary below, and get tickets here. Get Jim Henson's Labyrinth: In Concert Tickets Here “The legacy of my father’s film and the world of Labyrinth continue to be discovered and embraced by new generations of fans,” said Brian Henson, Chairman of the Board of The Jim Henson Company, in a statement. “Finding new ways to celebrate Labyrinth has been part of the fun, and we thank all of the amazing fans for continuing to support this magical film.” Meanwhile, Robert Eggers recently closed a deal to write and direct a film sequel to Labyrinth. Jim Henson’s Labyrinth: In Concert 2024-2025 Tour Dates: 03/16 – Santa Barbara, CA @ The Granada Theatre 03/17 – Cerritos, CA @ Cerritos Center for the Performing Arts 03/18 – Mesa, AZ @ Ikeda Theatre – Mesa Arts Center 03/19 – San Diego, CA @ Balboa Theatre 03/20 – Las Vegas, NV @ The Smith Center 03/21 – Los Angeles, CA @ The United Theater on Broadway 03/22 – Monterey, CA @ Golden State Theatre 03/23 – San Francisco, CA @ The Warfield 03/25 – Sacramento, CA @ Crest Theatre 03/26 – Eugene, OR @ McDonald Theater 03/27 – Portland, OR @ Revolution Hall 03/29 – Tacoma, WA @ Temple Theatre 03/31 – Spokane, WA @ Fox Theatre 04/01 – Boise, ID @ The Egyptian Theatre 04/02 – Salt Lake City, UT @ Kingsbury Hall 04/03 – Grand Junction, CO @ Avalon Theatre 04/04 – Denver, CO @ Paramount Theatre 04/05 – Pueblo, CO @ Pueblo Memorial Hall 04/08 – San Antonio, TX @ Tobin Center 04/09 – Austin, TX @ ACL Live @ The Moody Theatre 04/11 – Houston, TX @ Jones Hall for the Performing Arts 04/12 – Oklahoma City, OK @ Tower Theatre 04/13 – Wichita, KS @ The Cotillion Ballroom 04/16 – St. Louis, MO @ The Factory at the District 04/17 – Springfield, MO @ Gillioz Theatre 04/18 – Sioux City, IA @ Orpheum Theater 04/19 – Fargo, ND @ Fargo Theatre 04/21 – Davenport, IA @ Adler Theatre 04/22 – Joliet, IL @ Rialto Square Theatre 04/23 – Chicago, IL @ Riviera Theatre 04/24 – Peoria, IL @ Peoria Civic Center 04/25 – Nashville, TN @ Andrew Jackson Hall @ TPAC 04/29 – Baltimore, MD @ The Lyric Theatre 04/30 – Washington, DC @ Warner Theatre 05/01 – Rochester, NY @ Kodak Center 05/02 – New Brunswick, NJ @ State Theatre New Jersey 05/04 – New York, NY @ The Town Hall
html:
“Jim Henson’s Labyrinth: In Concert” North American tour kicked off in September 2024, featuring a band performing the score to the David Bowie 1986 cult classic live to screen in sync with his original vocals. Thanks to popular demand, a second North American leg has been announced, extending it through spring 2025.

Featuring more than 35 additional cities, the spring leg begins on March 16th in Santa Barbara, California, and will continue with stops in Los Angeles, Austin, Chicago, Nashville, New York, and more. See the full itinerary below, and get tickets here.

Get Jim Henson's Labyrinth: In Concert Tickets Here

“The legacy of my father’s film and the world of Labyrinth continue to be discovered and embraced by new generations of fans,” said Brian Henson, Chairman of the Board of The Jim Henson Company, in a statement. “Finding new ways to celebrate Labyrinth has been part of the fun, and we thank all of the amazing fans for continuing to support this magical film.”

Meanwhile, Robert Eggers recently closed a deal to write and direct a film sequel to Labyrinth.

Jim Henson’s Labyrinth: In Concert 2024-2025 Tour Dates:
03/16 – Santa Barbara, CA @ The Granada Theatre
03/17 – Cerritos, CA @ Cerritos Center for the Performing Arts
